name: Battle of the Bands (Cat Version)
description:
Its time for the battle of the bands concert! Can you help the team with a show stopper? 

Created for the A Game by its Cover Jam 2017 #AGBIC  based on the cover for "Are we dating or what?" by Sebastian Lopez ( http://famicase.com/17/softs/139.html)

Controls:

Use your mouse to make a selection.

Note:

Known to work using Firefox and Internet Explorer.
